content: in the next stitch increase made work 1 double_crochet in each of the next 9 stitches repeat from * to the marker 77 stitches row 12 *work 2 double_crochet in next stitch increase made double_crochet in each of the next 10 stitches repeat around from * 84 stitches row 13 *work 2 double_crochet in next stitch increase made double_crochet in each of the next 11 stitches repeat around from * 91 stitches row 14 *work 2 double_crochet in next stitch increase made double_crochet in each of the next 12 stitches repeat around from * to within 3 stitches of the end of the round work 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 1slip stitch fasten_off weave in ends 98 stitches if you need to dye the front panel brown do so now rinse well and let dry thoroughly large petals row 1 with yellow thread and smaller hook work a slip_stitch around the post of the first double_crochet in row 13 on the right side of the pouch front working on the surface of the pouch front ch1 work a single_crochet around the post of each of the next 12 double_crochet stitches ch2 turn 13 stitches row 2 double_crochet in each stitch across ch2 turn 13 stitches row 3 decrease decrease made double_crochet across the row to the last 2 stitches decrease decrease made ch2 turn 11 stitches row 4 decrease decrease made double_crochet across the row to the last 2 stitches decrease decrease made ch2 turn 9 stitches row 5 decrease decrease made double_crochet across the row to the last 2 stitches decrease decrease made ch2 turn 7 stitches row 6 decrease decrease made double_crochet across the row to the last 2 stitches decrease decrease made ch2 turn 5 stitches row 7 decrease decrease made double_crochet across the row to the last 2 stitches decrease decrease made ch2 turn 3 stitches row 8 yo insert hook in first stitch and pull a loop through insert hook in second stitch and pull a loop through insert hook in last stitch and pull a loop through yo and draw through all loops on hook finish off and weave in end starting in the next double_crochet repeat row 1-8 around for 6 more petals small petals row 1 attach thread around to post of any stitch in row 12 *chain 10 work a slip_stitch in the 2nd chain from hook working down the chain sc2 dc3 treble_crochet 3 skip 3 double_crochet on the pouch front slip_stitch around the post of the next double_crochet repeat from * around deliberately making some of the chains looser and some tighter to alter the sizes of the petals slightly slip stitch in first stitch 21 petals row 2 slip_stitch down to the row 11 on the pouch front and repeat petal row 1 fasten off weave in ends 19 petals bag note bag is worked with 2 strands of thread held together from this point on using the larger crochet hook don t worry if the pouch front and
